name: John Doe
bio: John is a senior with a passion for classical theatre. He loves bringing complex characters to life and has been a member of the club for four years.

name: Jane Smith
bio: Jane specializes in dramatic roles and has a knack for monologues. She's also an aspiring director and has assisted in several productions.

name: Alex Johnson
bio: Alex works behind the scenes to make every production a success. A skilled stage manager and designer, he ensures all shows run smoothly.

name: Emily White
bio: Emily is a newcomer with a lot of energy and talent. She is excited to explore all aspects of theater and contribute to the club.
